item.title: Whats wrong with my code now?
item.dc:creator: @ownage_plz ownage plz
item.description:
@ownage_plz wrote:

client.java:16055: cannot find symbol symbol : variable randomEventTimer location: class client if(randomEventTimer >= 1) { ^ client.java:16056: cannot find symbol symbol : variable randomEventTimer location: class client randomEventTimer -= 1; ^ client.java:16058: cannot find symbol symbol : variable randomEventTimer location: class client else if(randomEventTimer < 0) { ^ client.java:16059: cannot find symbol symbol : variable randomEventTimer location: class client randomEventTimer = 1000; ^ client.java:16062: cannot find symbol symbol : variable randomEventTimer location: class client randomEventTimer = 1000; ^ client.java:16373: cannot find symbol symbol : variable randomEventTimer location: class client if(randomEventTimer <= 0 && actionTimer <= 0) { ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 6 errors Press any key to continue . . .

Would mean he doesn’t have “randomEventTimer” declared. Go declare that.

Read full topic

item.title: Whats wrong with my code now?
item.dc:creator: @doggiedoo86 doggiedoo86
item.description:
@doggiedoo86 wrote:

if(randomEventTimer <= 0 && actionTimer <= 0) {
teleportToX = x;
teleportToY = y;
sendMessage(“you have been teleported”);
}

Make it:

if(randomEventTimer <= 0 && actionTimer <= 0) {
teleportToX = absx;
teleportToY = absy;
sendMessage("(YOUR MESSAGE HERE)");
}

Read full topic

item.title: Whats wrong with my code now?
item.dc:creator: @zonus_warrior zonus warrior
item.description:
@zonus_warrior wrote:

i’m making a timer to go down when people dont move or click anything that will tele them somewhere[br][size=1]Posted on: August 07, 2007, 07:16:06 PM[/size][hr]oh lol i tryed that i got

client.java:16055: cannot find symbol symbol : variable randomEventTimer location: class client if(randomEventTimer >= 1) { ^ client.java:16056: cannot find symbol symbol : variable randomEventTimer location: class client randomEventTimer -= 1; ^ client.java:16058: cannot find symbol symbol : variable randomEventTimer location: class client else if(randomEventTimer < 0) { ^ client.java:16059: cannot find symbol symbol : variable randomEventTimer location: class client randomEventTimer = 1000; ^ client.java:16062: cannot find symbol symbol : variable randomEventTimer location: class client randomEventTimer = 1000; ^ client.java:16373: cannot find symbol symbol : variable randomEventTimer location: class client if(randomEventTimer <= 0 && actionTimer <= 0) { ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 6 errors Press any key to continue . . .[br][size=1]Posted on: August 07, 2007, 07:18:51 PM[/size][hr]so yeah

item.title: Whats wrong with my code now?
item.dc:creator: @zonus_warrior zonus warrior
item.description:
@zonus_warrior wrote:

client.java:16058: not a statement randomEventTimer == 1000; ^ client.java:16062: not a statement randomEventTimer == 1000; ^ 2 errors Press any key to continue . . .

the == dont work for me lol

i got that error from if(randomEventTimer >= 1) { randomEventTimer -= 1; } else if(randomEventTimer < 0) { randomEventTimer == 1000; } if(actionTimer >= 1) { randomEventTimer == 1000; }
and

if(randomEventTimer <= 0 && actionTimer <= 0) { teleportToX = x; teleportToY = y; sendMessage("you have been teleported"); }

Read full topic
